name: 3by3 Slums (ODJ 09.07)
description:
You play as a little guy getting picked on by an ugly thug called "the Boss".  You need to dodge his graffiti attacks in a 3-by-3 grid. You take two hits and the game restarts. You can use purple chaos magic to damage the Boss. Hit him 10 times and you win.

Didn't have time to add a background, the main menu, a pause option/screen, a win screen, a loose screen, the Boss' dynamic eyes and arm placement, and more interesting attacks.

This game was made in 8+h over the course of a day as a part of my own declared challenge: One Day Jam. The goal of ODJ is to create a simple game in one day with a time budget of 8-9h.

Extra rules for ODJ that I follow:

  • One scene - no multiple levels, just one screen;
  • No music, sound, effects, options - this saves time and I'm lazy;
  • Very simple game idea - simple enough to port to mobile without adding onscreen joysticks and button clusters;
  • Use Unity or any high-level game engine - saves a bit of time :)

I plan to do more of these, that's why this one is dated 09.07.
